00057 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDLight : public FCDTargetedEntity
00058 {
00059 public:
00061     enum LightType
00062     {
00063         POINT, 
00064         SPOT, 
00065         AMBIENT, 
00066         DIRECTIONAL 
00067     };
00068 
00069 private:
00070     DeclareObjectType(FCDTargetedEntity);
00071 
00072     // Common Light parameters
00073     FMVector3 color;    
00074     float intensity; // Max and Maya
00075     LightType lightType;
00076 
00077     // Point and spot light parameters
00078     float constantAttenuationFactor;
00079     float linearAttenuationFactor;
00080     float quadracticAttenuationFactor;
00081 
00082     // Spot-specific light parameters
00083     float fallOffExponent;
00084     float fallOffAngle;
00085     float outerAngle; // Max-specific
00086     float penumbraAngle; // Maya-specifc: these last two are are related as 'penumbra = outerAngle - fallOffAngle'.
00087     float aspectRatio; // Max-specific, for rectangle lights
00088     float dropoff; // Maya-specific
00089     float defaultTargetDistance; // Max-specific?
00090 
00091     // Directional light parameters
00092     // Overshoot is a Max-specific flag that sets a directional light to cover everything,
00093     // rather than to be restricted to a cylinder defined by the fallOffAngle/outerAngle.
00094     bool overshoots; // Max-specific
00095 
00096     // Flags to indicate if we're using a DCC specific representation
00097     bool hasMayaExtras;
00098     bool hasMaxExtras;
00099

00103     FCDLight(FCDocument* document);
00104

00107

00111

00127
